With 17+ years of real-world IT experience, Sanjeev Paul isn‚Äôt just another trainer‚Äîhe‚Äôs a seasoned expert who has lived and breathed enterprise data engineering across the globe! Having worked with industry giants like Infosys, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, and currently a Senior Manager at Cognizant, Sanjeev brings a powerhouse of knowledge, insights, and industry secrets straight to your screen.

Sanjeev doesn‚Äôt just teach‚Äîhe transforms mindsets. His classes blend deep technical knowledge with real-world use cases, live project exposure, and industry best practices that can launch or accelerate your career in Azure Data Engineering.

If you're a fresher, career switcher, or working professional looking to break into one of the most in-demand tech careers‚ÄîSanjeev is the mentor you‚Äôve been waiting for.
